title: Chinese steamed salmon
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 dash sesame oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon julienned fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon Chinese black bean and garlic sauce', '1 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '125ml chicken stock', '4 (110g) fillets salmon', 'salt and pepper to taste']
